page.title: 09HAMPEN,THE HAMLET
page.content: Hampen,in the parish of Shipton Oliffe,is a hamlet a mile west of Salperton.It consists of three groups of dwellings,Hampen Manor with its farm buildings and 3 cottages,Hampen House with outbuildings and 3 cottages,2 of which have been sold to private owners,and Hampen Fam,near the A436 Andoversford-Bourton road which is now a private house with no land attached. Hampen Manor,built of Cotswold stone and about 500 years old,is in a valley and surrounded by trees.It has an air of solid practicality,while Hampen House,just above it,is an imposing residence with a Georgian frontage.It is no longer a farm and its 11 hectares are used as pasture for horses.
